translations: 研习间，小阅读室；小书房，小室

sentences.sentence: Merced was pondering this problem one day in his student carrel at the Bradbury library.
sentences.translation: 麦塞德整天都在布拉德布瑞图书馆的学生私人单间里思考这个问题。

sentences.sentence: He then returned to his carrel for his own research.
sentences.translation: 他接着就回到卡座去作自己的研究。

sentences.sentence: For many students of English, reading is by far the most important of the four skills in the foreign language (Carrel 1989).
sentences.translation: 正如卡莱尔所说，“对于许多学习者来说，阅读是四项语言技能中最重要的，在英语作为第二语言或外语学习中尤其如此”。
